name: 曾添文
objective:
本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.
schedule:
第 1 週:  Introduction
第 2-4 週:  Basic Principles in Catalysis and Catalytic Process
第 5-6 週:  Homogeneous Catalytic Process
第 7-8 週:  Heterogeneous Catalytic Process 
第 9 週:   Midterm
第 10-11 週:  Metal and Oxide Catalytic Process Development 
第 12-13 週:  Synthesis and Characterization of Solid Catalysts 
第 14-15 週:  Lab and Pilot Studies in Catalytic Process Development 
第 16 週:  Planning and Management of Future Catalytic Process Development
第 17 週:  Special Reports by Students 
第 18 週:  Final
